alert.note: Alert for Brown; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:50PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Brown and eastern Outagamie Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bellevue Town, or 3 miles southwest of Green Bay, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects and small tents. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bellevue Town around 255 PM CDT. Green Bay around 255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Little Rapids, Chicago Corners, Pittsfield, Oneida, De Pere, Freedom, Lambeau Field, Ledgeview, Hobart and Leo Frigo Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
